biotools.summary: CisMols (Cis-regulatory Modules) is a tool that identifies compositionally predicted cis-clusters that occur in groups of co-regulated genes within each of their ortholog-pair evolutionarily conserved cis-regulatory regions.

bioschemas.name: CisMols
bioschemas.summary: CisMols (Cis-regulatory Modules) is a tool that identifies compositionally predicted cis-clusters that occur in groups of co-regulated genes within each of their ortholog-pair evolutionarily conserved cis-regulatory regions.
